transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon. Sir, Ayush baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Ji abhi hai system pe sir samne?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai, ek baar sir open kariye.
Customer: Ek second thoda time do bas. Haan, isme na sir aapki do category aisi thi jisme aap lead to consume kar rahe the but usme koi product add nahi tha jaise ki high pressure washer ho gaya. Ek tha
Customer: High pressure washer washer ek second ek second ye washer vacuum cleaner ye hamare product nahi hai.
Executive: Ji fir ye lead ho sakta hai pehle galti se kar liya ho, main hatwa deta hun. Aap jao settings pe click karo pehle. Main hatwa raha hun aap se abhi turant hi hatwa deta hun. Bataiye.
Customer: Jaise hamare competitors kai hamare paas phone aa rahe hai ki sir plant ki jarurat hai wo unse puch rahe hai.
Executive: Hamare competitors humse puch rahe hai.
Executive: Kya puch rahe hai sir?
Customer: Ki matlab ki aap plant purchase karna chahte hain, kahan jarurat hai aapko, matlab jo hamare actually main bataun hua kya hoga, main batata hun. Nahi main bata deta hun kya hota hai. Aapki company ki listing top pe aa gayi har jagah pe. To jaise unke jo employees honge na sir, to wo kya kar rahe honge na wo har aise hi manufacturers ho gaya kisi ko call karte honge sabko ki kahi need to nahi hai. Main wo bhi aapko bata deta hun ki kaise unko hatana hai. Pehle na aap ek baar settings pe click karo jaake.
Customer: Ek second bas ek. Haan, pehle ye aapki category hatwa do jisse ye leads aani band ho jaye.
Customer: Aa gaya settings pe.
Executive: Buylead preferences pe jaiye.
Customer: Second.
Customer: Buyleads preferences likh ke aa raha hai upar. Iske niche aaiye category pe, category preference pe.
Customer: Ek second category preference.
Customer: Aur isme jo major cities hai, major cities mein UP nahi hai?
Executive: Main bata raha hun sir aapko kaise karna hai.
Customer: Aap pehle ye category hataye tabhi aap ye sari cheeze kar lete hai. Category preferences pe aaiye. Haan, ekdum niche aayenge na right side mein non preferred category likha hoga ek.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Usme aap type kariye high pressure washer.
Customer: Ye to yahi based on aur your buyleads ka. Haan isko cross kar lo yahan se. Isme pehle cross kar lijiye yahan se.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur right side mein hi non preferred category aa raha hai wahan pe isko add kar do high pressure washer karke.
Customer: Portable industrial world bahut hai yaar isme to.
Executive: Main aapko ek to category bata raha hun pehle inko hatana hai baki to aapki sahi hai. High pressure washer aur ek manual concrete mixer hai. Main manual concrete mixer mein kar rahe hai kya kaam sir hum?
Customer: Manual concrete mixer. Haan haan ho sakta hai wo leta hai haan. Manual mein ho raha hai sir? Haan manual bhi hai.
Executive: Theek hai ya to pehle to aap high ye wala hata lo high pressure washer karke wo non preferred mein dal dijiye.
Customer: Lo bhai main sare hata diya isme se. Haan.
Customer: Ab ab batao kya karna hai. Wo ho gaya sir add high pressure washer karke?
Customer: Nahi isme yaar. Add add karwa rahe ho?
Executive: Haan add ka matlab non preferred mein add ka matlab hota hai ki yahan se aapke paas ab leads kuch bhi nahi aayega, inquiry leads kuch nahi.
Customer: Isme to option hi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: High pressure washer add kar liya aapne usme non preferred mein? Matlab ki bas aap pura type karke fir add karna hoga. Haan pura haan high pressure washer daloge suggest kar dega wo khud hi.
Customer: Lo kar diya add. Theek hai. Invalid categories please enter a valid. Kya dalen sir isme?
Customer: High pressure washer.
Customer: Okay ab ho gaya. Ho gaya? Ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya.
Executive: Theek hai ab isme to hum kaam kar rahe hai sir manual concrete mixer mein?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab aap jaiye products pe. Products pe click kariye.
Customer: Accha ek second. Haan aa gaye products pe. Isme add product pe click kariye.
Customer: Kahan add product. Upar hi haan isme daliye ye manual concrete mixer.
Customer: Hello? Haan sir, ho gaya add?
Executive: Theek hai ab iske na aapki pehle wo dikha deta hun ke kahan kahan aapki dikh rahi hai. Right hand side mein dekhiye ek option dikh raha hai more option likha hoga right mein.
Customer: Right side mein. Ekdum right mein usi jahan pe add product aa raha tha na usi ke right mein dekhiye more options likha hoga ek.
Customer: Are isko kya karna hai sir jo main manual. Save and save and continue kariye isko. Sirf naam likh ke? Aage baad mein fill kar lijiyega sir usme photos and price wagera jo rahega. Hai na? Koi nahi koi nahi. Last finish karte hai. Haan finish kar dijiye ye add ho gaya aapka product theek hai ab iski leads aane lag jayengi aapke paas. Chalo ho gaya ho gaya. Ab ekdum right mein sir more option hai us pe click kariye.
Customer: Okay. Executive: Usme niche ek third option hai product categories us pe click kariye. Ab usme ab dekhiye aapka readymix concrete mixing plant aa raha hai Ahmedabad mein location aapki aa rahi hai listing mein. Concrete mixing plant as per plant Ahmedabad. Ye do category hai ab isme se na kisi pe bhi first second third kisi pe bhi jaise aapko Varanasi mein apni position check karni hai to us pe readymix concrete mixing plant pe click kar do aap. Kariye click ek baar.
Customer: Ek second sir kisi pe bhi. Haan kisi pe bhi kar dijiye bas location dekh lijiye wahan pe aapki dikh jayegi company ki position kahan pe aa rahi hai.
Customer: Matlab kisi ko bhi iska address change kar dena hoga. Haan matlab click kar do aap dekh lo pehle location aapko pata chal jayegi na aapki position kahan dikh rahi hai us particular area mein. Karne se. Haan click kariye readymix concrete wo jo keyword hai na us pe click kariyega.
Customer: Haan haan kar diya kar diya ab ye page open ho raha hai. In Gurgaon mein dekh lijiye aapki company first hi hogi sir. Haan. Theek hai ye sahi hai abhi hamari jo company ki position aapki jo listing hui hai wo near about 46 cities mein di hai hui hai. Ab aapne jaise mujhe kaha ki sir hame chahiye UP mein bhi theek hai to aap jaiye buyleads pe ab.
Customer: Buyleads aa gaya. Haan. Yahan pe sir type country or state or city likh ke aa raha hai dikh raha hai sir? Yahan pe Uttar Pradesh niche location mein upar location filter hai na ek?
Customer: Ek second location. Just upar buylead mein upar hi top pe location filter likh ke aata hai left mein dikh raha hai? Haan haan haan location. Haan is pe click kariye. Isme type mein Uttar Pradesh dal dijiye to aapko jitni bhi leads hongi na Uttar Pradesh ki wo show ho jayengi wo aapko bas contact karna hai. Call mat karna unko jo kaam ki na ho bas us pe contact kar lijiye aapki category ki honi chahiye. Koi bhi category hogi jitni jo hum deal kar rahe hai wahan pe aapki location aani chalu ho jayegi turant hi. Okay click kar diya. Hai na ab dekho haan ye aa gaya. Lekin sir fir bhi sirf ek hi lead hai Uttar Pradesh. Aaj aayi hogi sir ek hi dikhi rahi hogi aaj ya kal mein badh jayega aap Uttar Pradesh se aap jab usko consume kar lo ek bhi jisse ki at least Uttar Pradesh ke yahan ek hi dikh rahi hai abhi to ye wali hai. Is pe aapne isko kar lo aap aise hi na daily basis pe aapko ek se do lead na Uttar Pradesh ke search karke aapko karna hai jaise wahan ki locations pe aap ye portable mixer mixer grinder wo mixer machine jo ghar pe use karte hai wo to nahi hai ye? Wo nahi wo nahi nahi nahi wo nahi karna hai ek second rukiye. Ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya. Ho gaya? Complete. Is tarike se sir aapki location banti hai. Okay. Theek hai matlab aapko jahan jahan se bhi aap leads ya inquiries pe reply ya fir calls pe reply kaise bhi karoge to aapke paas wo location dikh jayegi. To ye sari cheeze hai sir ki aapko location ab dekho sir aap catalog view pe click karoge to abhi to shayad ek minute location. Abhi bhi nahi dikha raha. Ek bhi nahi aayi aaj. To fir ye aapko call kaise kar rahe hai baki companies wale bina aapka wo dekhe hue? Kyunki bina dekhe to nahi ho sakta sir bina aapka catalog kyunki listing to aa hi gayi hai. Ye sari cheeze ab aapki Uttar Pradesh mein badhe to yahi cheeze karni hai bas abhi aapka is week ka kaam ye rahega sir ki aapko na jaise bhi aapke particular category ki leads aati hai hai na aapko wo sari consume karni hai uske baad hum isme filter lagayenge jo aapke concrete nikle. Okay. Abhi hame location badhani hai apni kam se kam 100 cities tak le jaye to jyada better rahega. Isme to koi limitation nahi hai na sir kyunki aap 100 150 200 jitni bhi hai utna pe aap ja sakte ho. Ek cheez aur tha sir aapki ek category thi mini concrete mixer hai na? Haan haan haan. Isme jo humne product dala tha wo tha aapka RD20 BC mobile concrete batching plant. Kya hum ye same name nahi dal sakte sir model name? Same name nahi dal sakte mini concrete mixer sir? Mini mini mobile karenge sir mini mobile concrete mixer wo mini mobile karenge to sir mobile wale mein chala jayega ek baar add karna rukiye main khud karta hun. Mini mini kya dalna mini mobile concrete mixer? Haan. Rukiye main ek baar add karke check karta hun ye add ho raha hai ki nahi ye wala. Mini mobile concrete mixer abhi sir isme koi price wagera nahi dal raha hun main. Okay. Main na bas random isme ek ye bata dijiye concrete strength grade kya dal du M10 15 20 25 30 35 Hamara jo ye mini mobile hai ye aata hai 10 mein 10 B3 15 B3 10 15 aur 20 B3 20 B3 Ha 20 alag se dal dena. 20 B3 Ji. M nahi hai. 10 bhi hai 15 bhi hai 20 bhi hai teeno hai hamare paas. Ho gaya ho gaya sir mobile concrete teeno dal denge sir ho gaya add ab ho gayi mapping sahi. Ye ho gaya ye ho gaya matlab aapko apni na particular categories ke regarding bas leads ya aap inquiries pe reply ya calls jo aati hai un pe calls pe revert ye karna hai jisse ki aapki location badhna aur start hogi kyunki 46 city mein abhi hum hai aur badh jayenge sir. Okay. Koi bhi aapko doubt lagta hai aap mujhe batana sir jisse ki main aapki turant help kar paun. Jaise wahan jahan aapne bhi wo location ka wo bataya tha main pe ji wahan se location dal wahan nahi dal sakte Uttar Pradesh karke? Kahan pe matlab samjha nahi sir? Jahan bhi se 46 states ka hai na is pe haan haan kahan gaya kahan se pehle to settings pe tha na sir. To matlab ki hum jaise Uttar Pradesh mein agar koi search karega to yahan pe Uttar Pradesh dalunga to show ho jayega mujhe. Haan jaise lead koi man lete hai sir Uttar Pradesh se na koi bhi city se Uttar Pradesh ki lead post hui hai aapne Uttar Pradesh lagaoge to aapko show ho jayegi aap jaise contact karoge na usko automatically us particular city mein aapki company ki listing aa jayegi. Okay. Matlab jahan jahan se aap lead consume karte jaoge jis city se wahan wahan aapki listing aati chali chalu ho jayegi. Theek hai. Theek hai. Baki koi bhi aur help lagega sir main aapko call karunga bata dunga sir is cheez mein aapko bhi lagta hai to aap mujhe bataye theek hai sir. Haan haan bilkul bilkul wo cheez hai. Theek hai sir. Aur jo humne abhi naye product add kiye na sir aaj do isme sir photos wagera ho to update kar dijiye ya mujhe bhej do aap main update kar deta hun pricing wagera specification dal dijiye. Photos to usi mein hai lekin aap confuse ho jayenge photos mein. Haan wo aap update kar do sir wo jyada better rahega. Theek hai okay sir thank you so much. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's products not listed under correct categories.

- Competitors are calling and asking about plant requirements.

- Wants to increase leads from Uttar Pradesh.



Resolution:

- Executive removed incorrect categories (high pressure washer).

- Explained how competitors might be gathering information.

- Showed how to add manual concrete mixer product.

- Showed how to check company position in different cities.

- Explained how to filter buyleads by location (Uttar Pradesh).

- Executive added mini mobile concrete mixer product.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to consume leads and update product photos.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, categories, location, products, competitors
